author: ggovi
body:
#### PR description:

Several improvements for the DB credentials infrastructure:
- Fix for bug involving creation of new principals, introduced in the last PR involving the Credential Store class
- Introduced log collection for the procedure updating the Credential DB content
- Added support of db key for the python code
- conddb command support the db key

#### PR validation:

private test for principal creation
existing unit tests for conddb commands
title: Improvements for the DB credentials infrastructure
